jasima.shopSim.util

类 BatchStatCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.shopSim.core.ShopListenerBase
      • jasima.shopSim.util.BatchStatCollector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SimComponentLifeCycleListener, NotifierListener<SimComponent,java.lang.Object>, ShopListener, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BatchStatCollector
extends ShopListenerBase
    Collects batch statistics (flowtime and tardiness). A batch consists of a certain number of jobs started in succession.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt, 2012-08-21
